thread.title: CSX Revenue Weighed Down by Declines in Fuel Surcharges, Volumes

author: Anne Steele
title: CSX Revenue Weighed Down by Declines in Fuel Surcharges, Volumes
text:
CSX Corp. said Tuesday that its third-quarter revenue fell 8.8%, weighed down by lower fuel-surcharge revenue and volume declines.
Still, the Jacksonville, Fla., rail companyâ€™s per-share earnings came in a penny higher than expected, and shares rose 1.1% after hours.
Coal volume was down 18% in the latest quarter. CSX has been facing the... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
